env GO111MODULE=on

# Importing a subpackage from within a test should succeed.
# BUG: https://golang.org/issue/26279
! go list -test -json .

-- go.mod --
module example.com/hello

-- blah/blah_test.go --
package blah_test

import _ "example.com/hello/blah/other"

-- blah/other/other.go --
package other
